# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align perfectly with your needs. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while also maximizing my earnings. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
